name: As a Store Owner, I would like add new pet profile, upload pet image and delete pet profile

testSteps.description: As a Store Owner, I would like add new pet profile, upload pet image and delete pet profile #1: {petId=10, image=\src\test\resources\image\download.jpg}

children.description:
Given As a owner, I would add new pet to the store with the below data
| url | petId | categoryId | categoryName | petName | photoUrls | tagsId | tagsName | status |
| /pet | 10 | 0 | dog | doggie | \src\test\resources\image\download.jpg | 0 | test | available |
When I add new pet, it shoud be avilable to serach with pet by ID "10"
Then I upload a pet image "\src\test\resources\image\download.jpg" by "10"
And I can delete the pet profile by id "10"

title: As a Store Owner, I would like add new pet profile, upload pet image and delete pet profile

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given As a owner, I would add new pet to the store with the below data
When I add new pet, it shoud be avilable to serach with pet by ID "<petId>"
Then I upload a pet image "<image>" by "<petId>"
And I can delete the pet profile by id "<petId>"
